title: Samlucky O
author: Samlucky O
content: In less than 24 hours today FTT token has pump at about %51 from $1.22 to about $1.80 so I said let me bring this information to the forum if there is any possibility that this token Can still recover to it's all time high again. Because sometimes one can use such opportunity to achieve something. Although we talk about bitcoin investment always but just decided to share with us You can share your thoughts on this.

comments.author: Gormicsta
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on November 09, 2023, 01:58:53 AMso I said let me bring this information to the forum if there is any possibility that this token Can still recover to it's all time high again.It's pretty hard to predict which turn this sort of tokens would take my friend, these are pumped and dumped tokens, although I've seen rare cases where an abandoned project took another turn in the market and made a big wave but this only occur on rare occasions so I would keep my fingers crossed if I were you I remember being part of this project several years back, I was determined to hold on to the toke  while others where rushing on selling off their tokens simply because the project was at it's dump stage. I believed so much in this project and decided to HODL at all cost.It did pay off actually because the token did recover and beat its all time high, but that was the only time I witnessed such miracle.

comments.body: QuoteI remember being part of this project several years back, I was determined to hold on to the toke  while others where rushing on selling off their tokens simply because the project was at it's dump stage. I believed so much in this project and decided to HODL at all cost.It did pay off actually because the token did recover and beat its all time high, but that was the only time I witnessed such miracle.You seems to have had so much experience in the crypto space but your forum account speaks otherwise. comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on November 09, 2023, 01:58:53 AMIn less than 24 hours today FTT token has pump at about %51 from $1.22 to about $1.80 so I said let me bring this information to the forum if there is any possibility that this token Can still recover to it's all time high again. Because sometimes one can use such opportunity to achieve something. Although we talk about bitcoin investment always but just decided to share with us You can share your thoughts on this.Of course we have to discuss more about bitcoin than any other currencies here because bitcoin is the only reason why we all gather together here, now that your discussion is not in local language and yet still talking about altcoins discussion, i think this topic should be best discussed on altcoins discussion board, if you can agree with me to move it there, the more reason why we needed a local sub boards to help categorize all other threads to where they belong accordingly.

comments.author: Samlucky O
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on November 09, 2023, 01:58:53 AMIn less than 24 hours today FTT token has pump at about %51 from $1.22 to about $1.80 so I said let me bring this information to the forum if there is any possibility that this token Can still recover to it's all time high again. Because sometimes one can use such opportunity to achieve something. Although we talk about bitcoin investment always but just decided to share with us You can share your thoughts on this.I posted this thread in my local board on the 9th that was a day after yesterday concerning this particular altcoin how it jumps from $1.22 to $1.80 in less than 24hours seeing it as an altcoin that one might invest in the shortest period of time, but was bullied and that made me to lock this thread and moved it to altcoin discussion.. Although I was still skeptical about the price  movement it's was just about 24 hours but now it's about 72 hours making it hit $4.38 and now isteal have the reason to believe that this altcoin has the potential to recover like I said earlier. What do you guys think please.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: FTT token is a native currency of FTX exchange and due to collapse of the exchange I don't think people will have that trust again toward this project since their bedrock are being destroyed and investors lost huge funds during the collapse, this has caused so much damages to the crypto market. About their sudden increase, well i won't argue any bit of it but should be very mindful as altcoin can't be trusted despite any rise to me this is possibly to gain back their investor's faiths but believe me or not no reasonable investors would want to go investment with that project anymore because their image has been tarnished. As a piece of advice to you if investing always use the funds you won't come larmenting of how you have lost huge funds, always be vigilant otherwise you won't know what would have happened next.

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: This is pure gamble and we should never trust these pump and dump tokens ever, it's a trap I am telling you from my experience. Never ever think that abandoned projects will reach ATH and there are zero reason one should even be trading this token as it's a bubble which can burst anytime and boom all your investments and holding will be vanished like it happened. I don't think we should even discuss about FTT all time high rather we should be making people aware that it's a scam is back to pool some more money from naive investors, I am sure most of these who have invested into FTT and got more than 2x profits will not be cashing out yet in greed of more returns just to end up losing I mean there is nothing backing up this project and still it's pumping hard which means it's a pure manipulation.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on November 09, 2023, 01:58:53 AMIn less than 24 hours today FTT token has pump at about %51 from $1.22 to about $1.80 so I said let me bring this information to the forum if there is any possibility that this token Can still recover to it's all time high again. Because sometimes one can use such opportunity to achieve something. Although we talk about bitcoin investment always but just decided to share with us You can share your thoughts on this.I was surprised to see the price performance of FTX Token (FTT) recently, based on 7 day TF, the price of $FTT managed to rise up to 240% with the current price around $4. Back to the question, can $FTT reach its ATH again? I don't think so, it's because their image is already bad, maybe the significant increase that is happening now is because of market pumping from whales. Remember that the ATH of $FTT is around $84, that would require an increase of almost 20 times from the current price which is already pumped up.

comments.author: gabbie2010
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on November 09, 2023, 01:58:53 AMIn less than 24 hours today FTT token has pump at about %51 from $1.22 to about $1.80 so I said let me bring this information to the forum if there is any possibility that this token Can still recover to it's all time high again. Because sometimes one can use such opportunity to achieve something. Although we talk about bitcoin investment always but just decided to share with us You can share your thoughts on this.FTT current price stand at $4.7 it was indeed a massive pump in it price from $1.2 however the possibility of reaching another ATM is far from reality because the last ATH was $85.7 in 2021 that was a massive pump as it stand now the price is already in a bullish run however it's price movement or price Action isn't going to be a one way traffic there is going to be price pullback or reversal before reaching $10 therefore the chances of reaching another ATM is very slim, halving of Bitcoin next would result to a massive pump in it price so also other tokens Like FTT would also experience a massive pump also however I doubt if it price would reach the last ATM.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on November 09, 2023, 01:58:53 AMIn less than 24 hours today FTT token has pump at about %51 from $1.22 to about $1.80 so I said let me bring this information to the forum if there is any possibility that this token Can still recover to it's all time high again. Because sometimes one can use such opportunity to achieve something. Although we talk about bitcoin investment always but just decided to share with us You can share your thoughts on this.I highly doubt it. This exchange has a lot of shadiness from its core and I doubt investors will be too optimistic on this token to invest huge amount even high price without thinking that the previous owner of this project still holds a lot of this token and willing to dispose anytime if he has a chance.The existence of SBF is a threat to FTT growth that’s why it will never reach again ATH besides most of the CEX right has their own utility token which means competition is much tougher now compared before when FTT main rival is just BNB.

I believed so much in this project and decided to HODL at all cost.It did pay off actually because the token did recover and beat its all time high, but that was the only time I witnessed such miracle.

comments.author: Oneandpure
comments.body: Good recovery from FTT coins after OP post update under $2 and today success raise highest price around 24 hours more than $5, I don't know what beside news make FTT success raised up to higher price although their exchange not indicated will relaunch in short time. Talking about the opportunity hit ATH again I think its not easily around the highest price above $80 and difficult current price around $5. Regarding with their market not recovery or refund investors money I doubt with FTT will hit their ATH price although in this days make another highest price again. Need more than x20 time for FTT return to their ATH price and looks almost impossible there are not good news with current FTX exchange market, are there highest price of FTT depend with whales impact and some time have potential to make it drop drastically again?

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: Honestly speaking, it's just like the few juices left that can be dumped by whoever is holding a huge bag of it. I wouldn't want to catch those falling knives because for sure that many are hoping that they'll get a lot from it. I advise you to do your due diligence before going with the hype or else you'll be the one who's part of the crowd that's going to catch the falling knives. Don't get on it through type and there's no more hope with FTX and so does this token.

comments.author: Publictalk792
comments.body: It is interesting that significant pump in FTT token within such a short period of time. A 51% increase is quite impressive. While it is difficult to predict the future of any cryptocurrency especially in such a volatile market. By the way in my point of view it is not possible for FTT token to recover to its all time high again. It is important to make some analysis thorough research before making any investment decisions.

comments.author: FanEagle
comments.body: Quote from: batang_bitcoin on November 11, 2023, 01:26:46 PMHonestly speaking, it's just like the few juices left that can be dumped by whoever is holding a huge bag of it. I wouldn't want to catch those falling knives because for sure that many are hoping that they'll get a lot from it. I advise you to do your due diligence before going with the hype or else you'll be the one who's part of the crowd that's going to catch the falling knives. Don't get on it through type and there's no more hope with FTX and so does this token.Really? Yikes. I wouldn't want to feed those dumpers, but even if you say that there also people who are willing to pump the coin, I won't still invest on it. I wouldn't support the people who created this coin because they have done something wrong to the public.I feel sorry for those who hope to get big on this coin because they might only end up like that (hoping) but there is no real thing that is going to happen because I can feel that there are also lots of people who are scared to take risk and hates the coin too much for them to completely ignore it. There are many coins out there that needs our support better but I only hope they won't end up like FTT or FTX if they are still a new project.

comments.author: ft_lauderdale
comments.body: i feel that decentralization is the key ,  Any coin or token should not be controlled by a single or a group of persons , that was the original idea behind the foundation of starting bitcoin by satoshi after banking collapse in 2008.if you see, the price of bitcoin as we see now, the value it created is due to decentralization , bitcoin is neither an exchange nor any stable coin as direct mode of payment but a pure decentralized coin without any single entity controlling it. , it is accepted as payment mode due to its vast decentralization.similarly if you look at dogecoin , the original founder exited all his holdings long back  , once it got decentralized , the price increased significantly after that.i feel the same should happen with FTT token.There are thousands of youngsters who have worked hard invest in cryptos due to a better future ,  Why should they lose their hard earned money due to greed of others ?.

comments.author: Bushdark
comments.body: Quote from: Samlucky O on November 09, 2023, 01:58:53 AMIn less than 24 hours today FTT token has pump at about %51 from $1.22 to about $1.80 so I said let me bring this information to the forum if there is any possibility that this token Can still recover to it's all time high again. Because sometimes one can use such opportunity to achieve something. Although we talk about bitcoin investment always but just decided to share with us You can share your thoughts on this. Like we all know that the crypto market can be very unpredictable looking at some strange things we normally see in the market which we never expected to see. The project might go up again to a level that would surprised many investors that had sold there holdings. That is how the market works, anything can happen anything any day so if you are already holding, it would be better to keep holding since the bull market is still loading. Just like we have seen with pepe recently that the price skyrocket when no one ever thought it would toook that kind of brave movement.

comments.author: FinneysTrueVision
comments.body: When a token has fallen by 95% like FTT it is possible that we can see some big pumps. It won't get anywhere close to its ATH though. What remains of FTX is being sold off. FTT tokens could be abandoned entirely, dumped, or transferred to new ownership. If the FTX exchange comes back then the token would get relisted on many exchanges and current holders would use that opportunity to cash out causing the price to crash.You would have to be a complete degen to invest a significant amount in FTT right now. It will take a long time before everything is fully resolved with FTX. It is risky to trade this token but if you have a few bucks to play around then I don't see much of a problem.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: this token quite literally already abandoned by the exchange itself i don't expect it to increase in price, even though recently there has been some pump, but its just random pump that also happened to many shitcoin its not a long lasting pump one that can sustain for long period and allow it to set up for breaking all time high.if ftx is under new management there's not even any guarantee that the token itself will be utilized by the exchange and might possibly just abandoned since there are too many things needs to be solved with ftt.you could guess how's the fate of this token, abandoned and liquidated by the estate. its basically just a shitcoin at this point but people like to play around with rumours and news so therefore it will have some pump and dump but definitely will never reach all time high in my opinion.
